ui-label: Reference Mole Fraction Of Ozone In Air
description: This ozone field acts as a reference ozone field in a diagnostic call to the model's radiation scheme. "Mole fraction" is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y. The chemical formula for ozone is O3. The IUPAC name for ozone is trioxygen.
